data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Wakiso to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wakiso, Uganda
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Wakiso, Uganda, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Over 16.91 percent of the people of Wakiso are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, may the churches in Wakiso, Uganda honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Swahili people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Swahili people.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Wakiso to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Wakiso, Uganda a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Wakiso, Uganda a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

location.name: Wakiso
location.people_groups_list: Amba, Chinese, general, Kalenjin, Pokot, Kaliko, Karamojong
